ch0327_00_pina/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, it’s my old pal, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Lemme guess—you’re here to hang out with me,
right?
ch0327_00_pina/0101_0701_02_10: I’m ready to party! Let’s make some noise!
ch0327_00_pina/7101_0701_01_10:
Everyone on Team Star has a bit of an edgy
personality.
ch0327_00_pina/7101_0701_02_10:
And that can lead to varying degrees of friction
with the people around us, sometimes...
ch0327_00_pina/7101_0701_03_10:
But I think you’re the kind of person we could all
get along with just fine!
ch0327_00_pina/7101_0701_04_10:
You’ve got a lotta people with strong personalities
around you, after all!
ch0327_00_pina/7102_0701_01_10:
On Pasio, the rule is you gotta battle in teams of
three...
ch0327_00_pina/7102_0701_02_10:
But that doesn’t mean single battles or other battle
formats are banned.
ch0327_00_pina/7102_0701_03_10: I’m all for having that kind of flexibility!
ch0327_00_pina/7103_0701_01_10:
I’m gonna keep taking on more and more
Dark-type Pokémon experts in battle!
ch0327_00_pina/7103_0701_02_10:
I bet if I keep going up against all these super
strong folks on Pasio, it’ll help me get stronger!
ch0327_00_pina/7103_0701_03_10:
As the Boss of the Segin Squad, I can’t be a
rookie forever.
ch0327_00_pina/7104_0701_01_10:
I’ve been holding guerrilla gigs every so often!
Why don’t you come to one?
ch0327_00_pina/7104_0701_02_10:
DJ Vice’s beat drop’ll bust your ears open!
Let it shake you down to your soul!
ch0327_00_pina/7105_0701_01_10:
I know some training facilities where a talented
battler like you could REALLY leave their mark,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0327_00_pina/7105_0701_02_10: They’re called STCs—the Star Training Centers!
ch0327_00_pina/7105_0701_03_10: Come visit Paldea and take ’em on!
ch0327_00_pina/1701_0701_01_10:
I’ve got something I want you to have. Here, it’s
all yours.
ch0327_00_pina/1701_0702_01_10:
I know you’re the kind of person who can make
use of any item I give ya!
ch0327_00_pina/2501_0701_01_10:
Team Star is comin’ to Pasio, all the way from
Paldea!
ch0327_00_pina/2501_0701_02_10:
The best way to break the ice and feel less like
strangers is by greeting everyone with a big, loud
voice!
ch0327_00_pina/2501_0702_02_10: HEY, EVERYONE! NICE TO MEET YOU!!!
ch0327_00_pina/2501_0702_03_10:
GOOD MORNING!!!
GOOD AFTERNOON!!!
GOOD EVENING!!!
ch0327_00_pina/2511_0701_01_10:
I’m the one who made Team Star’s code of
conduct after everyone asked me to...
ch0327_00_pina/2511_0701_02_10:
And I’m glad I took on that task, ’cause that code
led to our bond as a team growing even stronger!
ch0327_00_pina/2511_0701_03_10:
It made me start to think that havin’ rules isn’t
always a bad thing.
ch0327_00_pina/2511_0702_01_10:
It’s not good to sit around doing nothing, but you
really shouldn’t go overboard, either. That’s
something I learned in school.
ch0327_00_pina/2511_0702_02_10: In anything you do, moderation is key!
ch0327_00_pina/2511_0702_03_10: Make sure you don’t overdo it either, OK?
ch0327_00_pina/3001_0701_01_10:
MORNIN’, Y’AAAAAALL!!!
What? Just givin’ a friendly greeting to lift
the mood!
ch0327_00_pina/3003_0701_01_10:
You gotta tackle everything like you’re kickin’ off
the day’s one and only session!
ch0327_00_pina/3005_0701_01_10:
If you need a wake-up call tomorrow, leave it to
me! I’ll pick out some killer tunes.
